name: Thomas White
text: The bar area at this location is not what you would expect. Their pizzas are on par with other MM locations in the area. I go here because they make lactose free pizza that is actually pretty good. Good enough that non lactose intolerant ‚Ä¶More

text: The House Special pizza was better than EXCELLENT.  Service with Lauralaine was spot on great. You will cheat yourself if you do not get the 3 meatball appetizer!!!

name: Julie Williams-Swiggett
text: Be warned...no one in the kitchen (that I could see) is wearing a mask!!!! The wait staff is properly masked and were very friendly. Service was prompt. I know it must be hot in a kitchen with a mask on, but puh-lease!!! Your are in plain ‚Ä¶More

text: Went on a Sunday night, not busy at all. Seated outside right away & had a very simple order-just  plain cheese pizza. Waited extremely long with no update until right before it was delivered. Server was very nice & apologized that kitchen ‚Ä¶More

name: Gary Robertson
text: Nice pizza, but when I ordered it changed locations and I had to pick it up 10 miles away at another shop in their chain. But it was very nice pizza!

name: Paul Langan
text: I love this place for the professional and kind wait team, dining room tables, outdoor seating, great food, choices for vegetarians, lighting and long bar. Excellent for individual, families or groups of friends. Cosmic Karma is.my favorite ‚Ä¶More

name: MJ Pulliams
text: I've been to other locations and enjoyed the fare. I was greatly disappointed in my experience at this one. The pizza was very doughy. Pass.

name: Zion Smallwood
text: Great tasting pizza.  Hot and cheesy for our Mighty meaty pizza and Holy Shitake. This location tasted a bit better than a few others that I have visited.

name: Giovany Addun
text: The Maui Wowie pizza was great. Went labor day weekend and it was not too busy. Nice patio seating.

name: Jerry Stahr
text: Great food and atmosphere.  LOVE the Tye Dye!

name: Derrell Haith
text: 2 hours for some pizza that's not even that good half my order prepared and need refund for part of it I've worked many pizza joint i. My day and this place does not have it together, i was about to ask if I could go fling my own dough ‚Ä¶More

name: Jonathon Guill
text: First visit to Mellow Mushroom in Wrightsville Beach, it was a great experience. Staff was awesome food was great. Came out quicker than expected. Very nice atmosphere. Would definitely go back. Smaller location but the outside seating is awesome.

name: Christian Heiche
text: Satisfactory service accommodated with moderately good Pizza. Not wowed but was served what we expected. Wait was unusually long for 2 pizzas, but quality takes time. This place is a nice small place to chill and relax. Family friendly for sure with vibe decor and entertaining overhead music! May come back again in the future!

name: Lindsey Taylor
text: Better than Fish House Grill a block away and friendlier staff too!

name: Pamela Mcquaid
text: Good pizza. Nice people

text: Oh my god the pizza there are delicious !!! Would return anytime !!! The crust and the parmesan they put on top is simply heaven !!!

name: Michelle Gumina
text: The pizza is delicious. The people are lovely. There is an outdoor covered and heated patio that you can bring your puppy with. I go out of my way to eat here!

name: Rebecca Trammel
text: Food was fantastic. Service was friendly and attentive. Atmosphere just right! My favorite thing was the pretzel bites with beer cheese dipping sauce. Absolutely amazing! My calzone was huge. It could have I said two people easily. The decor is whimsical and simple. It's the perfect place to go for lunch with friends.

name: Franchesca Ruiz
text: I was unsatisfied the food has no taste

name: Darek Anderson
text: Great food, food takes 10-20 minutes to get served to you so no long wait times. Nice seating good, entertainment. Nice place in general.

name: Dallas Ludwig
text: Great experience and ordering vegan for my friend was no problem at all. The waitress was amazing and everyone went home happy. Though it was much smaller than the ones in Knoxville, the food and speed didn't reflect the smaller size. Loved it and will definitely be stopping by again

name: Shelia Edwards
text: I ordered veggie calzone without dairy products, but was brought one with regular 3 cheeses dusted with parmesan. As soon as I received it, my ordered was corrected with vegan cheese in a timely manner.   As I am lactose intolerant with IBS. I appreciated the great customer service!

name: Dave Tinker
text: The pizza is always great, the wait, not so much. I suppose that good things take time. The service staff is always friendly and everything always seems fresh. We will most certainly return. If you haven't been I would highly recommend that you check them out.

text: Food is great. The classic old school jerk chicken hoagie is fantastic. If you like subs & pizza this is a great choice.

name: Mirranda Jenkins

name: Salinas Cindy
text: 1st time dining in at mellow mushroom. Great service and yummy pizza. Also ordered a steak and cheese sub that was okay.

name: Tim Puller
text: If you've never been to Mellow Mushroom, I highly recommend checking it out! A very chill vibe, delicious subs and pizzas, friendly staff, and all around a great experience! If you have been here before, then you don't need my review to go back! I've been hooked for the past 10 years, and will be long to come!

name: Paig Horton
text: Ordered two small pizzas and pretzel bites to go when we were in the area. Took maybe 20 minutes to get our order and appreciated the military discount as well. If you eat one thing here, make it the bites! They were phenomenal. The beer ‚Ä¶More

name: Tim Hicks
text: Consistently good service, friendly faces, and great food.  Always offered a drink to go, checked in on and never felt neglected.  Very surprising for a beach town.  Highly recommend their lunch Caesar with grilled chicken and the Holy Shitake Mushroom pizza.  Keep it up guys, you rock!

name: Jessica
text: Very friendly staff and fast service.

name: Ronnie Williams
text: It's great food and service!

name: Tristan Pease
text: I didn't know it was a chain when I started eating here - has a very local feel. One of the best pizza places around in either case - amazing crust, fresh toppings. The beer selection is decent - if you want something more interesting you can grab something right next door though.

name: Patrick Filippone
text: Excellent brick oven pizza,  sizes range from personal to large. And you build your own from a very large selection of toppings.  A fairly large outside seating area is available too.

name: wesley steuwe
text: Nice cozy olace to eat outside. We've been to a few mellow mushrooms and never disappointed.disappointed

text: The service was okay. The meatball sub I had was very good. The area behind the bar could stand a good bleaching.

name: Catherine Arnold
text: Gaby got our order wrong not once, but twice in the same sitting. It took us 40 minutes to get our food and it wasn't even that busy. On top of that, I ordered a pepperoni pizza to go, and she brought out a cheese pizza along with our bill. ‚Ä¶More

text: Great place to eat. Completely love there menu. They also have some great bar specials. I have never had a bad experience

She forgot the plates for our appetizer until we were halfway done eating it. And finally we waited 15 minutes to get the check and pay. They weren't that busy. It's a shame because the food was really good.

text: The pizza here is really good. What I like most is that they have options for people with celiac and other people who need gluten-free items. They are really good about not cross contaminating.
